item.title: What we know so far about the Brown University shooting
item.description: Police are searching for the suspect after a gunman opened fire in a classroom, killing two and injuring nine others in Providence, Rhode Island.

item.title: 'Person of interest' detained over Brown University shooting, police say
item.description: Two people died and nine others were injured in the incident in Rhode Island on Saturday.

item.title: Eyewitness captures moment man tackles and disarms Bondi shooter
item.description: New South Wales Police say that 11 people were killed, plus one gunman, in a shooting at Bondi Beach targeting the Jewish community.

item.title: John Cena takes his final bow, after last ever WWE fight
item.description: The actor and wrestler brought the curtain down on a 24-year career that saw him become one of wrestling's biggest stars.

item.title: Five arrested over plot to attack German Christmas market
item.description: Local media says one of the suspects is an imam at a mosque, and police allege he "called for a vehicle attack".
